sequence:
Lunar New Year Celebration

<size=45>Chapter 2 - The Great Spring "Cleaning!"</size>

scripts.say: Ahem! This year's Great Spring Cleaning is about to commence!
Ohhhh!!
Vroooom!! I'm gonna clean this stuff up in a flash like a gale cutting through fallen leaves!
Hawawawa! The place I just cleaned... it's all messy again...
Unlike on the battlefield, that kind of "cleaning up" only generates more headaches...
Ahaha... I seemed to have lapsed in my vigilance, but I will have to pay extra attention during this festival... to "clean up" all the pests from Commander's port...
Sister, today's cleaning is the ordinary kind. Please try to contain your urges a bit...
Worry not, Kaga. I would never cause any unnecessary trouble. Unless, of course, those pests start clinging to Commander...
I seem to have overheard something rather perverse...
Oh my, it seems like there's something interesting going on here.
Hm? You're the Iron Blood's....
Ah, it's Eugen. Good day. We're currently in the middle of the Sakura Empire's annual Great Spring Cleaning.
"Great Spring Cleaning," huh? By the way, I saw Commander with some girl just now...
Wh-what...?! So there needs to be some thorough "cleaning" after all... Ahhhhh, Commander, wait for me! Akagi is rushing to your side!
As expected, this form of "cleaning" is much more entertaining. Hehe...
Masterminding a ploy to divert Akagi's destructive power just like that... the Iron Blood isn't to be underestimated.
Hardly. Akagi is just an open book when it comes to the commander.
Jeez, there's still so much cleaning to do, and Akagi ran off just like that?
In that case, why don't I help out?
Eh? Are you sure?
Hehe~ Let's just say I'm a bit intrigued by the your "New Year."
